WRITING.TEXT: Do you have specific meals tailored to a workout or do you just mix the meals up as you go along?

WRITING.TITLE: Vegan gym plan/meal plan
WRITING.TEXT:
So let's make this short..
I'm planning to start hitting the gym for the first time since I've been vegan (of 1 year).
I'm calling out to reddit to ask what things should I be looking for to make sure I don't harm my body but give it what it needs to build adequate muscle. Should I take certain vitamins and should I use a protein power? Anyone recommend a workout plan or a meal plan?
I'm a novice so sorry if this question seems vague, many thanks in advance.
Keep saving lives /r/vegan!

The term I think you're referring to is cognitive dissonance!
Here's a good article that talks about it!
http://www.thevegansdilemma.com/blog/2014/12/5/cognitive-dissonance

If you think it's right then there should be no one to tell you otherwise!
My parents were dead against me going vegan, I ruined their Christmas and I'm ruining myself as well..
I know that I'm going to live my life the same way just not eating animal products.. It's no biggie, my body will function the same, my brain thinks the same, nothing changes..
Just think how many lives you've spared, always makes me happy!
Be vegan and proud!
H!

The article looks at cognitive dissonance which all people who eat meat have. They know killing animals is inhumane but because everyone does it, it's ok! Mass ignorance, mass peer pressure and mass uninformed populous..

Video about pointy eggs, seen it all.
Thanks Reddit.

Just heard about a priest in Normandy being forced on his knees and his throat slit all which was on camera..
Poor fella, past few days has been a murderous few!
Stay safe all!
Eating animal products?

So my little vent is more of something I noticed missing perhaps..
Why don't gyms show up on your journal? Attempts on gyms should be included too!
I say attempts as I've never got a win yet..
Also why can't I see where I caught my pokemon? No map shows...

So at the moment I'm just transferring all my duplicates as I get them, I should start saving them so I can evolve them..
Thanks Reddit!
Can someone explain what this calculator is for? Is it for maximising exp through evolutions?

As for all languages.. I'm English and speak French and German! Learnt both by the book and boy learning grammar is easy, at least there's patterns to follow! Learning new vocabulary is always the challenge..

Look at these four cases in German, personally it's quite interesting how they work, super interesting!
The Dative, The Accusative and The Genitive and the Nominative.
Check out this site for more clarification, it's a lot of writing otherwise!
http://german.speak7.com/german_cases.htm
She's a bitch.

You should always try and get rid of the biggest threat first I say, aka the units that can do the most damage to you.
If they are attacking you with a group of marines and they have tanks behind, how are you going to attack through the units?
Its wholly dependent on the situation! Clarity is key!
Has someone else already left the house? What a drama..

Well if they make the changes they said then I really shouldn't have an issue..
Let's see how long these patches take..
True that, she was in the wrong too!
Elephant is thinking, how much longer do I have to stay here and do your stupid tricks. I don't know the story to these elephants but they deserve more than being kick boards..
His forwards backwards walk wasn't very convincing.
I kind of think it's a good idea! We'd all have similar policies! Fight back against the EU superstate to come!
BB7 is the gold. The Nikki Grahame quotes still live on in the current bbuk!
Honestly though, if you see a brute and anders you know a rush is imminent..
I just hope if Scotland chooses to leave, all members of the U.K. should vote as Scotland Ireland vote in English politics!

Charlie : I'm here to maximise it to the max.
Wow.
I like and dislike him, he makes me laugh and surprises me more than any other housemate!
Definitely! Wearing her promiscuous office attire and stomping around in her high heels!
We think she resembles moaning myrtle from Harry Potter.. Voice and all!
That second article is dated from 2015, a totally different article. Please remove it to stop confusing people!

Everyone always asks me this question.. I take it first of all for practicality. I carry a water bottle, book, portable charger, plasters and a penknife usually.. Also if I go food shopping I can easily stuff it in rather than use a plastic bag, save the planet one bag at a time!
I have a friend who carries spare socks just in case his feet get cold!
People always ask why but when they have something they don't want to carry I'm always the first person to offer to carry it!
It's Banff the city which is in Alberta the province which is in Canada.

So I actually hiked to a point just above Lake Louise! Past Mirror Lake and Lake Agnes up to The Beehive. This is the view with Lake Louise on the right hand side!
http://imgur.com/mQaYwxL

I've been wondering about having a bell go off every 15mn or 30mn but ended up deciding against it and I was starting to count how long I was meditating. How does everyone quantify the amount of meditation they do without interrupting it so abruptly?
Eagle chilling tied up.. Bit of an oxymoron..

WRITING.TITLE: After reading people losing their accounts..
WRITING.TEXT:
Hello everyone, there seems to be so many posts recently regarding people losing accounts and no longer being able to access them.
Due to this I've written all my RS details down, including my ISP, my IP, addresses and everything.. I would recommend other users do the same.
Don't want to keep hearing guys and girls are losing accounts! Keep on RS'ing.
Just do it. Solidarity together.

Early Twenties, recent graduate, working.
I'm not sure why I browse these. It definitely makes me grateful for being alive, but at the same time there's a lot of curiosity about it all really..
You look like you live in a very nice place. Lots of fresh air and green spaces.. Oh to live in a town.. :(

WRITING.TITLE: Aaron said nothing could be heard from Alexandria, so why could we hear the children playing?
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]

I remember the conversation Rick Aaron had..
Something along the lines of what could be heard from the base. Aaron said *nothing can be heard at all*,
yet we could hear the sounds of children playing.
Sound a bit suspicious to anyone or is Ricks paranoia rubbing off on me?
GLENNS FACE GOT ME SO BAD.
Plot Twist. The medic was vegetarian.
I'm here in the UK, in the north to be specific and there's not much here unfortunately.. :(

If you're playing an RnB event and someone is asking for dubstep then I suppose requests are annoying..
